mapper.sql: a.cfg_id AS "cfgId", a.cfg_type AS "cfgType", a.cfg_code AS "cfgCode", a.cfg_name AS "cfgName", a.cfg_value1 AS "cfgValue1", a.cfg_value2 AS "cfgValue2", a.cfg_value3 AS "cfgValue3", a.cfg_value4 AS "cfgValue4", a.cfg_value5 AS "cfgValue5", a.cfg_value6 AS "cfgValue6", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.create_person AS "createPerson", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_person AS "updatePerson", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks"
